title: Try Dying
description: A gorehound with loads of money runs into the ultimate prize of a sadist – a woman who loves being cut within an inch of her life.But there is more to her than the average world-weary broad with a death wish.She has made a habit of the business of dying.A habit that she wants to kick with a vengeance.Join the duo on a wild ride where blood is thinner than water and death is as elusive as the holy grail.(This book contains violence and disturbing content of a sexual nature. Readers’ discretion is advised.)
author: Rajeev Singh
